format: This data frame contains the following columns:
title: Population of U.S. Cities
description:
Description
The bigcity data frame has 49 rows and 2 columns.
The city data frame has 10 rows and 2 columns.
The measurements are the
population (in 1000's) of 49 U.S. cities in 1920 and 1930.  The 49 cities are 
a random sample taken from the 196 largest cities in 1920.  The city data 
frame consists of the first 10 observations in bigcity.
